marklogic.body: I would really love to see McGuinty live the way I have lived for the past 28 years after an accident at work left me disabled and no employer would give me a job because of that. I was given a $400.00 a month pension from Worker Comp. that pension today after 28 years is only $511.00. because the government bases a cost of living increase on a formula that basically gives me an increase to my pension if cost of living is only above 2.5%. they save a lot of money by not giving us the actual cost of living, something that is not applied to their own pensions which are fully indexed. I have had to make my own way in life with no help from anyone, working twice as hard as any politician ever in order to survive. Today I own my own home in a remote area. with no hydro except for that which I make with solar panels and a couple of Batteries. I have no running water and have to use an outhouse. My 85 year old log cabin is Heated with wood and I drive a vehicle that is 25 years old. So yes I would like to see all politicians live the way I do, and i`ll bet they don`t even last a week.
